description: Enable Large Language Model clients to interact seamlessly with any MediaWiki wiki. Perform actions such as creating, updating, and searching wiki pages, as well as retrieving file and page history information. Securely connect using OAuth 2.0 tokens to manage wiki content efficiently.

capabilities.name: get-page
capabilities.description: Returns a wiki page. Use metadata=true to retrieve the revision ID required by update-page. Set content="none" to fetch only metadata without content.

capabilities.name: get-page-history
capabilities.description: Returns information about the latest revisions to a wiki page, in segments of 20 revisions, starting with the latest revision. The response includes API routes for the next oldest, next newest, and latest revision segments.

capabilities.name: search-page
capabilities.description: Search wiki page titles and contents for the provided search terms, and returns matching pages.

capabilities.name: set-wiki
capabilities.description: Sets the wiki to use for the current session. You MUST call this tool when interacting with a new wiki.

capabilities.name: add-wiki
capabilities.description: Adds a new wiki to the MCP resources from a URL.

capabilities.name: remove-wiki
capabilities.description: Removes a wiki from the MCP resources.

capabilities.name: update-page
capabilities.description: Updates a wiki page. Replaces the existing content of a page with the provided content

capabilities.name: get-file
capabilities.description: Returns information about a file, including links to download the file in thumbnail, preview, and original formats.

capabilities.name: create-page
capabilities.description: Creates a wiki page with the provided content.

capabilities.name: upload-file
capabilities.description: Uploads a file to the wiki from the local disk.

capabilities.name: upload-file-from-url
capabilities.description: Uploads a file to the wiki from a web URL.

capabilities.name: get-revision
capabilities.description: Returns a revision of a wiki page.

capabilities.name: get-category-members
capabilities.description: Gets all members in the category. Returns only page IDs, namespaces, and titles.

capabilities.name: search-page-by-prefix
capabilities.description: Performs a prefix search for page titles.
